org.hps.recon.utils

Class TrackTruthRelationsDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.recon.utils.TrackTruthRelationsDriver

  • public class TrackTruthRelationsDriver
extends Driver
    This driver creates an MCParticle relation to be persisted for each track collection It also saves a TruthTrack
